description: Variation of conditions 1, 11, 16 and 17 of planning permission dated 25 June 2020 (RN 20/02329/FULL) which itself varied conditions 1, 5 and 14 of planning permission dated 9 October 2019 (18/07494/FULL) for the use as a restaurant (Class A3) and associated alterations including reinstatement of front third floor window, replacement of rear third floor window, new glazed roof over rear lightwell, new rooflights to rear ground floor, installation of mechanical plant in front basement vaults and internal alterations, namely to allow internal changes to the layout; to vary the wording of condition 11 to read 'You must not allow more than 140 customers into the property at any one time'; to vary the wording of condition 16 to read 'During the operating hours of the restaurant all windows and rooflights to the rear of the building must be fixed shut except in cases of emergency purge ventilation' and to vary the wording of condition 17 to read 'You must not sell any take-away food or drink on the premises, with the exception of caf√© items from the ground floor unit occupied by The Gentlemen Baristas.'
